column1: How can Notes be useful for my business?
column2: The Notes App for your business gives you a publishing tool (just like a blog). Notes allow you to generate content for your business to share more information and connect with your audience. For every Note that you create for your business, you can have a main photo, and an album of the Note.

column1: How many Notes can I write for my business?
column2: There is no limit on the number of Notes that you can create for your business. You can create any number of Notes for your business.

column1: How can I write a Note on my business?
column2:
You can write Notes on your business in one of the following ways:  
1. To write a Note, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the business Profile.
b. Click “Notes” tab on the business Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Notes”.
c. Click on “Write a Note” link from the top left corner of the “Notes” tab.
d. Fill up the form to write a note. To make your business Note attractive, use the WYSIWYG editor and upload a suitable image.
e. Now, when you’re done with filling up the form, select the status to “Published” for publishing the Note and to generate the feeds of note creation to update your business fans.

2. From the “Apps” section of your business Dashboard, click on the “Write a Note” button and follow the steps from ‘d’ to ‘e’ as in case 1 above.

column1: Who all can write Notes on my business?
column2: You can choose who all can write Notes for your business while creating your business, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Notes Creation Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit business Details” link for your business.

column1: I want to search for a specific business Note. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a business Note using the detailed search box available in the “Notes” section under business navigation.

column1: What are Sponsored business Notes? How can Notes created on my business be made Sponsored?
column2:
Sponsored business Notes are those Notes which have been created for Paid businesses. These Sponsored Notes will appear in the “Sponsored Notes” block in the “Notes” section under business navigation. On “Browse Notes” for business Notes and in search results, they are marked with a “Sponsored” marker. The search form for business Notes also has a quick filter for seeing Sponsored Notes.
If your business is created under a Paid Package, then the Notes created for it would automatically be made Sponsored. The availability of Paid business Packages on our site is conditional depending on the settings configured by our site administrators.

column1: What are Featured business Notes? Who can mark Notes for businesses as Featured?
column2:
Featured business Notes are notes of businesses which are specially marked as “Featured”. Such notes are more highlighted than others and thus gain more visibility. Featured business Notes appear in the “Featured Notes” slideshow in the “Notes” section under business navigation. On “Browse Notes” for business Notes and in search results, they are marked with a “Featured” marker. The search form for business Notes also has a quick filter for seeing Featured Notes.
business Notes can be made Featured only by our site administrators.

column1: I have a business on this site. However, the Notes feature is not available for my business. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Notes feature is not available for your business could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your business for which the Notes App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Notes App suits you. You can change the Package for your business from the “Packages” section of your business Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for businesses, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
